Verses: 1 appozhudhu Yoseppu Than Aruge Nindra Ellaarukkum Munbaagath Thannai Adakkikkondirukkakkoodaamal: Yaavaraiyum Ennaivittu Veliye Pogappannungal Endru Kattalaiyittaan. Yoseppu Than Sagodhararukkuth Thannai Velippaduththugaiyil, Oruvarum Avan Arugil Nirkavillai.
2 avan Saththamittu Azhudhaan; Adhai Egipthiyar Kettaargal, Paarvonin Veettaarum Kettaargal.

3 yoseppu Than Sagodhararaippaarththu: Naan Yoseppu; En Thagappanaar Innum Uyirode Irukkiraaraa Endraan. Avanudaiya Sagodharar Avanukku Munbaagak Kalakkamutrirundhadhinaale, Avanukku Uththaram Sollakkoodaamal Irundhaargal.

4 appozhudhu Yoseppu Than Sagodhararai Nokki: En Kitta Vaarungal Endraan. Avargal Kittapponaargal; Appozhudhu Avan: Neengal Egipthukkup Pogiravargalidaththil Vitruppotta Ungal Sagodharanaagiya Yoseppu Naandhaan.
5 ennai Ivvidaththil Varumbadi Vitruppottadhinaal, Neengal Sanjalappadavendaam; Adhu Ungalukku Visanamaayirukkavum Vendaam; Jeevaratchanai Seyyumbadikkuth Dhevan Ennai Ungalukku Munne Anuppinaar.
6 dhesaththil Ippozhudhu Irandu Varushamaagap Panjam Undaayirukkiradhu; Innum Aindhu Varusham Uzhavum Aruppum Illaamal Panjam Irukkum.
7 boomiyile Ungal Vamsam Ozhiyaamalirukka Ungalai Aadharikkiradharkaagavum, Periya Ratchippinaal Ungalai Uyirode Kaappatharkaagavum Dhevan Ennai Ungalukku Munnale Anuppinaar.

8 aadhalaal Neengal Alla, Dhevane Ennai Ivvidaththukku Anuppi, Ennaip Paarvonukkuth Thagappanaagavum, Avar Kudumpam Anaiththirkum Karththaraagavum, Egipthudhesam Muzhudhukkum Adhibadhiyaagavum Vaiththaar.
9 neengal Seekkiramaai En Thagappanidaththil Poi: Dhevan Ennai Egipthudhesam Muzhuvadhukkum Adhibadhiyaaga Vaiththaar; Ennidaththil Vaarum, Thaamadhikka Vendaam.
10 neerum, Ummudaiya Pillaigalum, Avargaludaiya Pillaigalum, Ummudaiya Aadumaadugalodum Umakku Undaayirukkira Yaavatrodum Kosen Naattil Vaasampanni En Sameebaththil Irukkalaam.

11 umakkum Ummudaiya Kutumbaththaarukkum Umakku Irukkira Yaavatrirkum Varumai Varaadhabadikku, Ange Ummaip Paraamarippen; Innum Aindhu Varusham Panjam Irukkum Endru, Ummudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppu Sollasonnaan Endru Sollungal.
12 idho, Ungalode Pesugira Vaai En Vaaidhaan Enbadhai Ungal Kangalum En Thambiyaagiya Benyameenin Kangalum Kaangiradhe.
13 egipthile Enakku Undaayirukkira Sagala Magimaiyaiyum, Neengal Kanda Yaavaiyum En Thagappanukku Ariviththu, Avar Seekkiramaai Ivvidaththukku Varumbadi Seyyungal Endru Solli;
14 than Thambiyaagiya Benyameenin Kazhuththaik Kattikkondu Azhudhaan; Benyameenum Avan Kazhuththaik Kattikkondu Azhudhaan.
15 pinbu Than Sagodharar Yaavaraiyum Muththamcheydhu, Avargalaiyum Kattikkondu Azhudhaan. Adharkuppin Avan Sagodharar Avanode Sambaashiththaargal.
16 yoseppin Sagodharar Vandhaargal Engira Samaachaaram Paarvon Aramanaiyil Pirasithdhamaanapodhu, Paarvonum Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Sandhosham Adaindhaargal.
17 paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: Nee Un Sagodhararode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Ungal Kazhudhaigalinmel Podhiyetrikkondu Purappattu, Kaanaandhesaththukkup Poi,
18 ungal Thagappanaiyum Ungal Kudumbaththaaraiyum Koottikkondu, Ennidaththil Vaarungal, Naan Ungalukku Egipthudhesaththin Nanmaiyaith Tharuven; Dhesaththin Kozhumaiyaich Saappiduveergal.
19 neengal Ungal Kuzhandhaigalukkaagavum Ungal Manaivigalukkaagavum Vandigalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Kondupoi, Avargalaiyum Ungal Thagappanudane Etrikkondu Vaarungal.
20 ungal Thattumuttugalaik Kuriththuk Kavalaippadavendaam; Egipthudhesamengumulla Nanmai Ungaludaiyaadhaayirukkum Endru Sollach Solli, Unakku Naan Itta Kattalaippadiye Sey Endraan.
21 isravelin Kumaarar Appadiye Seydhaargal, Yoseppu Paarvonudaiya Kattalaiyinbadiye Avargalukku Vandigalaik Koduththadhumandri, Vazhikku Aagaaraththaiyum,
22 avargalil Ovvoruvanukkum Maatru Vasthirangalaiyum Koduththaan; Benyameenukko Munnooru Vellikkaasaiyum Aindhu Maatru Vasthirangalaiyum Koduththaan.

23 appadiye Than Thagappanukkup Paththuk Kazhudhaigalinmel Egipthin Uchchidhamaana Padhaarththangalum, Paththuk Kolikaik Kazhudhaigalinmel Than Thagappanukkaaga Vazhikkuth Dhaaniyamum Appamum Matrath Thinpandangalum Etri Anuppinaan.
24 melum, Neengal Pogum Vazhiyile Sandaipannikkollaadhirungal Endru Avan Than Sagodhararukkuch Solli Anuppinaan; Avargal Purappattupponaargal.
25 avargal Egipthilirundhu Poi, Kaanaandhesaththile Thangal Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobinidaththil Vandhu:
26 yoseppu Uyirodirukkiraan, Avan Egipthudhesaththukkellaam Adhipadhiyaayirukkiraan Endru Avanukku Ariviththaargal. Avan Irudhayam Moorchchai Adaindhadhu; Avan Avargalai Nambavillai.

27 avargal Yoseppu Thangaludane Sonna Vaarththaigal Yaavaiyum Avanukkuch Sonnapodhum, Thannai Etrikkondu Pogumbadi Yoseppu Anuppina Vandigalai Avan Kandapodhum, Avargaludaiya Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobin Aavi Uyirththadhu.
28 appozhudhu Isravel: En Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppu Innum Uyirodirukkiraane, Idhu Podhum; Naan Maranamadaiyumunne Poi Avanaip Paarppen Endraan.
